Need some help?

Do you want to become a Front End Developer? Are you're stuck? Have no idea where to start? Maybe you're further down the learning pathway and you need a hand with your portfolio and/or CV? Not to worry! Help is on its way - see the support options below.

Join the Discord Community

Why should I join?

  • It's completely free, which is always nice.
  • Get support from other newbie coders on a similar mission to you.
  • It's a safe environment where you can feel confident asking any questions.
  • Find out about the best resources to learn from to save you time and money.
  • Ask me any questions you may have!
JOIN NOW

Direct mentorship (limited spots available)

For a limited number of students, I will be providing a more focused mentorship support. This will involve weekly one-to-one video calls. For many students, the focus of these calls will be to help structure your learning pathway, but for others we may decide to point our focus elsewhere, toward a range of different topics i.e. specific front end code related issues, portfolio and cv buidling review and assistance etc.

To apply, send an email to james@thefrontendcoach.com outlining a few things:

  • A brief introduction about yourself.
  • Why you want to become a Front End Developer.
  • Your biggest blockers to learning and pursuing your goals at the currrent time.
